scripts.build: npm run generate:locales && npm run build -w @dragdropdeploy/shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.docs:api: npm run openapi:gen -w backend && node scripts/docs/generate-openapi-md.cjs && npm run docs:typedoc:strict && npm run docs:includes && node scripts/docs/postprocess-api-md.cjs
scripts.docs:check: npm run docs:scan && npm run docs:env && npm run docs:changelog:sync && npm run docs:roadmap && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:lint
scripts.docs:typedoc: npm run typedoc -w @dragdropdeploy/shared && npm run typedoc -w backend
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:backend && npm run coverage:frontend
scripts.ci:all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test -w backend -- --runInBand && npm test -w frontend && npm run build -w @dragdropdeploy/shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.ci:full: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run prisma:generate -w backend && npm run docs:check && npm test -w backend -- --runInBand && npm test -w frontend && npm run coverage:backend && npm run coverage:frontend && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w @dragdropdeploy/shared && npm run build -w frontend
